option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CAMERA" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES" />
<queries> <package android:name="com.whatsapp" /> <package android:name="com.whatsapp.w4b" /> </queries>
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.UnaspMarketplace">
<!-- Facebook App ID Configuration --> <meta-data android:name="com.facebook.sdk.ApplicationId" android:value="@string/facebook_app_id" />
<meta-data android:name="com.facebook.sdk.ClientToken" android:value="@string/facebook_client_token" />
<!-- Facebook Login Activity --> <activity android:name="com.facebook.FacebookActivity" android:configChanges="keyboard|keyboardHidden|screenLayout|screenSize|orientation" android:label="@string/app_name" />
<activity android:name="com.facebook.CustomTabActivity" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.BROWSABLE" /> <data android:scheme="@string/fb_login_protocol_scheme" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<activity android:name=".MainActivity" android:exported="false" />
<activity android:name=".LoginActivity" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<activity android:name=".RegisterActivity"/>
<!-- Tela Home --> <activity android:name=".HomeActivity" />
<!-- Tela Checkout --> <activity android:name=".CartActivity" />
<!-- Tela de Cadastro de Produtos --> <activity android:name=".PostItemActivity" />
<!-- Tela de Detalhes do Produto --> <activity android:name=".ProductDetailActivity" />
<!-- Tela de Perfil --> <activity android:name=".ProfileActivity" />
<!-- Tela de Pagamento --> <activity android:name=".PaymentActivity" />
</application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CAMERA" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES" />
<queries> <package android:name="com.whatsapp" /> <package android:name="com.whatsapp.w4b" /> </queries>
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.UnaspMarketplace">
<!-- Facebook App ID Configuration --> <meta-data android:name="com.facebook.sdk.ApplicationId" android:value="@string/facebook_app_id" />
<meta-data android:name="com.facebook.sdk.ClientToken" android:value="@string/facebook_client_token" />
<!-- Facebook Login Activity --> <activity android:name="com.facebook.FacebookActivity" android:configChanges="keyboard|keyboardHidden|screenLayout|screenSize|orientation" android:label="@string/app_name" />
<activity android:name="com.facebook.CustomTabActivity" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.BROWSABLE" /> <data android:scheme="@string/fb_login_protocol_scheme" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<activity android:name=".MainActivity" android:exported="false" />
<activity android:name=".LoginActivity" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<activity android:name=".RegisterActivity"/>
<!-- Tela Home --> <activity android:name=".HomeActivity" />
<!-- Tela Checkout --> <activity android:name=".CartActivity" />
<!-- Tela de Cadastro de Produtos --> <activity android:name=".PostItemActivity" />
<!-- Tela de Detalhes do Produto --> <activity android:name=".ProductDetailActivity" />
<!-- Tela de Perfil --> <activity android:name=".ProfileActivity" />
<!-- Tela de Pagamento --> <activity android:name=".PaymentActivity" />
<!-- Tela de Preview do Pedido --> <activity android:name=".OrderPreviewActivity" />
<!-- Tela de Sucesso do Pedido --> <activity android:name=".OrderSuccessActivity" />
</application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Header --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/order_preview" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/blue_default" android:gravity="center" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Card do Pedido --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@android:color/white" android:padding="16dp" android:elevation="4dp">
<!-- ScrollView para o conteúdo do pedido --> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1">
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtOrderPreview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:fontFamily="monospace" android:lineSpacingExtra="4dp" android:text="Carregando pedido..." />
</ScrollView>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Footer com contador e informações --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/blue_default" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp">
<!-- Contador --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtCountdown" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Redirecionando em 5 segundos..." android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- Informação --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/order_preview_info" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" android:gravity="center" />
<!-- Botões --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="12dp">
<Button android:id="@+id/btnSendNow" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/send_now" android:backgroundTint="#000000" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:layout_marginEnd="4dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnTestWhatsApp" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Teste Zap" android:backgroundTint="#25D366" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:layout_marginStart="2dp" android:layout_marginEnd="2dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnCancel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/cancel" android:backgroundTint="@android:color/darker_gray" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white" android:padding="32dp" android:gravity="center">
<!-- Ícone de sucesso --> <ImageView android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_dialog_info" android:tint="@color/blue_default" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" />
<!-- Título --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/order_sent_success" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/blue_default" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<!-- ID do Pedido --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtOrderId" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Pedido: #PED12345678" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- Nome do Cliente --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtCustomerName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Cliente: João Silva" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" />
<!-- Mensagem --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/order_sent_message" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" />
<!-- Botão voltar --> <Button android:id="@+id/btnBackToHome" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/back_to_home" android:backgroundTint="@color/blue_default" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="16sp" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<resources> <string name="app_name">Unasp Marketplace</string> <string name="bem_vindo_ao_unasp_marketplace">Bem-vindo ao Unasp Marketplace!</string> <string name="logo">Logo</string> <string name="categorias">Categorias</string> <string name="email">Email</string> <string name="senha">Senha</string> <string name="entrar_com_google">Entrar com Google</string> <string name="github">GitHub</string> <string name="google">Google</string> <string name="checkout">Finalizar Compra</string> <string name="cart">Carrinho</string> <string name="title">Unasp Marketplace</string> <string name="new_product">Novo Produto</string> <string name="btn_log_in">Acessar</string> <string name="login_forgot_password">Esqueci minha senha</string> <string name="login_in_to_sign">Ainda não tem acesso?</string> <string name="btn_login_in_to_sign">Cadastre-se</string> <string name="sign_in_name">Nome Completo</string> <string name="sign_in_password_confirm">Confirme sua senha</string> <string name="btn_sign_in">Criar e acessar</string> <string name="login_remember_me">Lembrar de mim</string> <string name="default_web_client_id">524313708339-2tmt7fo1ackpjsc435il2vsuaf09jlas.apps.googleusercontent.com</string> <string name="facebook_app_id">728278693617290</string> <string name="facebook_client_token">594f2190665ae830b83cc7bc6a84ede9</string> <string name="fb_login_protocol_scheme">fb728278693617290</string>
<!-- Payment Activity Strings --> <string name="payment_method">Forma de Pagamento</string> <string name="pickup_info_title">Local de Retirada</string> <string name="pickup_info_description">Todos os produtos devem ser retirados na UNASP Store</string> <string name="customer_info">Dados do Cliente</string> <string name="full_name">Nome Completo</string> <string name="whatsapp_number_optional">WhatsApp (opcional)</string> <string name="choose_payment_method">Escolha sua forma de pagamento na retirada:</string> <string name="payment_debit">Cartão de Débito</string> <string name="payment_credit">Cartão de Crédito</string> <string name="payment_pix">PIX</string> <string name="payment_cash">Dinheiro</string> <string name="confirm_payment">Gerar Pedido</string> <string name="order_generated">Pedido Gerado com Sucesso!</string> <string name="opening_whatsapp">Abrindo WhatsApp para enviar pedido...</string> <string name="fill_all_fields">Preencha todos os campos obrigatórios</string>
</resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<resources> <string name="app_name">Unasp Marketplace</string> <string name="bem_vindo_ao_unasp_marketplace">Bem-vindo ao Unasp Marketplace!</string> <string name="logo">Logo</string> <string name="categorias">Categorias</string> <string name="email">Email</string> <string name="senha">Senha</string> <string name="entrar_com_google">Entrar com Google</string> <string name="github">GitHub</string> <string name="google">Google</string> <string name="checkout">Finalizar Compra</string> <string name="cart">Carrinho</string> <string name="title">Unasp Marketplace</string> <string name="new_product">Novo Produto</string> <string name="btn_log_in">Acessar</string> <string name="login_forgot_password">Esqueci minha senha</string> <string name="login_in_to_sign">Ainda não tem acesso?</string> <string name="btn_login_in_to_sign">Cadastre-se</string> <string name="sign_in_name">Nome Completo</string> <string name="sign_in_password_confirm">Confirme sua senha</string> <string name="btn_sign_in">Criar e acessar</string> <string name="login_remember_me">Lembrar de mim</string> <string name="default_web_client_id">524313708339-2tmt7fo1ackpjsc435il2vsuaf09jlas.apps.googleusercontent.com</string> <string name="facebook_app_id">728278693617290</string> <string name="facebook_client_token">594f2190665ae830b83cc7bc6a84ede9</string> <string name="fb_login_protocol_scheme">fb728278693617290</string>
<!-- Payment Activity Strings --> <string name="payment_method">Forma de Pagamento</string> <string name="pickup_info_title">Local de Retirada</string> <string name="pickup_info_description">Todos os produtos devem ser retirados na UNASP Store</string> <string name="customer_info">Dados do Cliente</string> <string name="full_name">Nome Completo</string> <string name="whatsapp_number_optional">WhatsApp (opcional)</string> <string name="choose_payment_method">Escolha sua forma de pagamento na retirada:</string> <string name="payment_debit">Cartão de Débito</string> <string name="payment_credit">Cartão de Crédito</string> <string name="payment_pix">PIX</string> <string name="payment_cash">Dinheiro</string> <string name="confirm_payment">Gerar Pedido</string> <string name="order_generated">Pedido Gerado com Sucesso!</string> <string name="opening_whatsapp">Abrindo WhatsApp para enviar pedido...</string> <string name="fill_all_fields">Preencha todos os campos obrigatórios</string>
<!-- Order Preview Activity Strings --> <string name="order_preview">Preview do Pedido</string> <string name="order_preview_info">Seu pedido será enviado automaticamente via WhatsApp</string> <string name="send_now">Enviar Agora</string> <string name="cancel">Cancelar</string> <string name="redirecting_in">Redirecionando em %d segundos...</string>
<!-- Order Success Activity Strings --> <string name="order_sent_success">Pedido Enviado!</string> <string name="order_sent_message">Seu pedido foi enviado para a UNASP Store via WhatsApp.\nAguarde a confirmação do recebimento.</string> <string name="back_to_home">Voltar ao Início</string>
</resources>
